participant_1.background:
I had to get a job early as a child.
I never learned how to swim.
I like anime shows.
My mother passed away in 1979.
I am a meat eater.

participant_2.background:
I want to own a house on a beach.
My parents both are school teachers.
The only music i listen to is pop , because it makes me feel happy.
I love eating at mcdonalds.

content.text: Hi, I'm [User 1 name]. What's your name?
Hi, I'm [User 2 name]. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch anime shows and eat meat. What about you?
I love eating at McDonald's and listening to pop music. What do you like about anime?
I like the way the stories are told and the characters are developed. What do you like about pop music?
I like the upbeat tempo and the catchy melodies. I also love the way it makes me feel happy.
I can understand that. I also like how it can make me forget about my troubles for a while.
Me too. It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I agree. So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
I know what you mean. I'm still trying to figure that out too.
Well, I'm sure we'll both figure it out eventually.
I'm sure we will. In the meantime, we can enjoy our favorite things.
